course_title: Social Behavior in Public Health for Advanced Nursing Practice
course_description: Introduction to basic principles of psychosocial determinants of behavioral risk that affect health from a local to international perspective. Determinants are addressed within theories, models, and frameworks of health-related behavior with application to public health practice within nursing.
sections: Class Nbr: 1820, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: J. Cranmer, Status: Open
